meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>end</kanji> of the <kanji>week</kanji> is the <vocabulary>weekend</vocabulary>... that is, unless you work on the weekend, but we can't cater to everyone here.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
